name: Spooky Takeover!
description:
You died your last dieing breath and ended up living your life as a ghost. Everything is peaceful until the buyers and real estate agents come along and try to sell the abandoned home! fortunately, you equipped your house with spooky weapons to help defend against these pesky buyers! Now you must scare them off so they never come again!

All of the programming was done by me!

Let me know what you think of the game please! I want to improve and make better games that you guys can enjoy!

This game was for a Friday Night Game Jam, which I made in nearly 5 hours and 28 minutes.
